query.name: com.apex.learning.school.students
query.description: Gets students to update Apex Learning environment.
query.sql: SELECT students.id, students.First_Name, students.Middle_Name, students.Last_Name, students.Web_ID, students.Web_Password FROM students

query.name: com.apex.learning.school.classrooms
query.description: Gets sections to update Apex Learning classrooms.
query.sql: SELECT sections.id, sections.course_number, sections.grade_level, sections.section_number, sections.termid FROM sections
